## POST  [/brapi/v1/programs-search]

```{r}
library(brapi)

# make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process
con <- ba_connect()
ba_show_info(TRUE)
json <- ba_programs(con, rclass = "json")
ba_show_info(FALSE)
```

### Response

Code: 200 (application/json)

```json
`r json`
```
